definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: [[אחה]] (stem assumed for [[אָח]]; which however perh. bilit. & prim, so Thes Rob Ges al.; Dl:HA 59 prop, surround, protect; Dl:W comp. aḫu, side., Zehnpfund:BAS 1. 510 prop. belong together,  cf. Schult. Thes. De Goeje in RS:Sem 256 N suggests connection with ḥayy, family, clan).
